name: Lil Skies
description: '''Kimetrius Christopher Foose''' (born August 4, 1998), known by his stage name '''Lil Skies''', is an American rapper and singer from [[Waynesboro, Pennsylvania|Waynesboro]], [[Pennsylvania]]. He signed with [[Atlantic Records]] in 2017 to release the singles "[[I (Lil Skies song)|I]]", "[[Nowadays (song)|Nowadays]]", and "[[Red Roses (song)|Red Roses]]." The songs peaked at numbers 39, 55, and 69 on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]], respectively. His eighth mixtape and major label debut, ''[[Life of a Dark Rose]]'' (2018), peaked at number ten on the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] and received [[RIAA certification|platinum]] certification by the [[Recording Industry Association of America]] (RIAA). His debut studio album, [[Shelby (album)|''Shelby'']] (2019), and its follow-up ''[[Unbothered]]'' (2021), peaked at numbers five and 50 on the chart, respectively.
